name: Road to Somewhere
description:
Your mission is simple: keep your ship flying, and reach the end.

This game was created in one week as part of the 2020 Winter Epic MegaJam by the following people

  • Aaron Winebrenner (programming, writing, music)
    • awinebrenner@gmail.com
  • Nathan Laidler (3D Models)
    • artofmind99@gmail.com
  • Nick Rankin (sound effects, foley)
    • nicholas@nicholasrankinmusic.com
  • Isaac Brotzman (voice over)
    • isaacbrotzmanactor@gmail.com)

All assets were created during the jam except

  • SM_SkySphere, but you know, it's a flipped normal sphere
